messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Unschooling conference Feb 10 in Madison, WI
messages.msgSnippet: ... Oh man!!  I wish I could go. Madison is one of my favorite cities! I ve been there for Wiscons (The only feminist science fiction writers conventions) and
messages.messageBody:
On 10/17/06, freecycletc <freecycletc@...> wrote:
> Hi. I'm new to your list. I am a deschooled/unschooler in Madison,
> WI. The unschool support group to which I belong is planning the
> first ever unschooling conference in Madison on Feb 10, 2007.

Oh man!! I wish I could go. Madison is one of my favorite cities!
I've been there for Wiscons (The only feminist science fiction writers
conventions) and love Madison! It's gorgeous in the spring. Would
love to see it in the winter.

Michelle

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Unschooling conference Feb 10 in Madison, WI
messages.msgSnippet: WooHoo! Another conference. I wish I was close enough to pop on over. I hope it all goes off without a hitch. :o) -- ~Mary http://zenmommasgarden.blogspot.com/
messages.messageBody:
WooHoo! Another conference. I wish I was close enough to pop on over. I hope it all goes off without a hitch. :o)

--
~Mary
http://zenmommasgarden.blogspot.com/

"The miracle is not to walk on water. The miracle is to walk on the
green earth, dwelling deeply in the present moment and feeling truly
alive."
~Thich Nhat Hanh

messages.subject: Unschooling conference Feb 10 in Madison, WI
messages.msgSnippet: Hi.  I m new to your list.  I am a deschooled/unschooler in Madison, WI.  The unschool support group to which I belong is planning the first ever unschooling
messages.messageBody:
Hi. I'm new to your list. I am a deschooled/unschooler in Madison,
WI. The unschool support group to which I belong is planning the
first ever unschooling conference in Madison on Feb 10, 2007. We are
very excited to be doing this and welcome inquiries. Registration
information will be available after Nov 1st, at which time it is also
our goal to have a website up.

This is our first conference, and it will be small, but we hope to grow.
We would love to have participants from throughout the Midwest. For
more information you can contact The Unschooling Conference at
freecycletc@...
